items.title: OTAKU x hololive English Advent VS Justice Collaboration Merchandise Launch
items.author: Horii
items.content:
December 19, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a new merchandise collaboration with OTAKU in partnership with hololive production, featuring talents from hololive English -Advent- and hololive English -Justice.

This collaboration introduces a brand new lineup of premium merchandise inspired by the concept of “hololive English Advent VS Justice,” designed to celebrate the unique personalities and worlds of the participating talents. Every item has been carefully crafted with exceptional quality.

Products will be available for purchase and ready to ship from launch, while apparel items will be listed as pre-sale, with shipping scheduled for May 2026.

For more information, please visit OTAKU’s official website and social media platforms.

December 19, 2025 (9:00 AM EST) to December 31, 2025 (11:59 PM EST)

Available worldwide (excluding mainland China)

OTAKU is a lifestyle brand dedicated to creating high quality merchandise inspired by global fandom culture. With a strong focus on craftsmanship and design, OTAKU aims to deliver products that fans can proudly display and enjoy in their everyday lives.

items.title: Beard Papa’s × hololive English -Justice- Collab Begins in the United States from January 3, 2026
items.author: Horii
items.content:
December 16, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce a collaboration between hololive English -Justice- and world-famous fresh and natural cream puff chain Beard Papa’s. Beginning January 3rd, 2026 for a limited time, U.S. Beard Papa’s locations will debut four talent-inspired cream puffs, each themed after a member of the hololive English -Justice-.

“We’re thrilled to collaborate with hololive English -Justice- on bringing the talents to life through our handcrafted cream puffs,” said Mark Nathan, Marketing Director of Beard Papa’s. “Fans love the creativity and personality of hololive’s talents, and this collaboration allowed us to create completely new flavors guided by each member’s input, while maintaining Beard Papa’s signature quality.”

For more information, please visit Beard Papa’s official website and social media platforms.

Limited-Edition Cream Puffs made together with hololive English -Justice-

During the collaboration, fans can try Beard Papa’s iconic freshly baked puffs paired with flavor profiles crafted to reflect the personalities, color palettes, and motifs of each talent. These limited-edition flavors will be available for purchase at participating Beard Papa’s stores nationwide.

Every flavor was developed with input from the talents themselves, resulting in cream puffs that authentically capture each member’s unique style and character. The flavors and puffs are as follows:

A striking pink-raspberry chocolate shell with Oreo crumble and blue nonpareils, reflecting Elizabeth’s bold flair and engaging presence.

A bright, refreshing matcha-white chocolate dip topped with soft mini marshmallows, capturing Cecilia’s calm, green aesthetic and happy energy.

Rich dark Belgian chocolate custard paired with handmade orange crumble and finishing chocolate, inspired by Gigi’s bright colors and fun energy.

A strawberry-vanilla crumble coating crowned with a disc-chocolate “hat,” reflecting Raora’s charisma and playful charm.

Collector Combo Sets for a Unique Fan Experience

To complement the four limited-edition hololive English -Justice- talent’s cream puffs, fans can also purchase exclusive collaboration sets available in three formats. The 4-Piece Set includes one of each talent flavor paired with a 4-sticker collectible pack featuring the hololive English -Justice- members.

For guests looking to enjoy more, the 6-Piece Set includes all four talent puffs plus two Original Beard Papa’s cream puffs and comes with an exclusive acrylic keychain available only through this set.

For the ultimate collector, the 12-Piece Set features two full 6-packs and is bundled with a limited-edition collaboration tote bag, making it the premium option for fans and families alike.

The Beard Papa’s x hololive English -Justice- Collaboration Puffs will be available for a limited time at all participating Beard Papa’s locations across the U.S. Online orders will be available through the Beard Papa’s official app, website, and delivery partners in select markets.

Originally founded in Osaka, Japan in 1999, Beard Papa’s has grown into a global dessert phenomenon known for its crisp shell, fluffy choux pastry, and all-natural cream fillings made fresh daily. With locations across the U.S. and over 550 stores worldwide, Beard Papa’s continues to delight fans with seasonal flavors, creative collaborations, and its signature tagline — “World’s Best Cream Puff.”

items.title: Venue/Livestream Tickets for hololive production’s EXPO 2026 and hololive 7th fes. On Sale Starting Today!
items.author: narita
items.content:
December 8, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN — COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan, CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) is excited to announce that VTuber agency hololive production will be holding its production-wide events “hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Supported By BANDAI” and “hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams Supported By LAWSON” on March 6-8, 2026 at the Makuhari Messe International Exhibition Halls.

The theme for EXPO 2026 is Transcend time and space and experience the vast world of hololive. At EXPO 2026, embark on a special journey that takes you all around the hololive universe with 3 main areas around a central monument where fans can discover hololive from all different perspectives.

hololive will also be putting on its 7th live concert, “hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams.” There will be 4 hololive STAGES held across all 3 days, which will come alive with song and dance performances from each and every hololive talent.

From 8:00 PM (JST) this evening, we will begin accepting applications for the 1st round of advance tickets (lottery) for hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 and hololive 7th fes. Tickets for the hololive 7th fes. online livestream will also go on sale on SPWN and Streaming+. We are looking forward to seeing you all at hololive production’s first-ever 3-day event!

■ Official hashtag (for both EXPO and fes.) #hololivefesEXPO26

Overview of “hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Supported By BANDAI”

The theme for EXPO 2026 is where fans can enjoy a wide variety of hololive experiences in the following 3 main areas.

This is the entrance to a parallel universe featuring all-new hololive experiences such as 3D footage of past live performances shown on a big screen and special interactive booths.

Immerse yourself in a world packed full of hololive content, where you enjoy yourself to your heart’s content with monitoring talks, a hololive Official Card Game booth and much more!

Time travel through different memories we have created together and look forward to a bright future together with life-sized panels featuring original illustrations, a time capsule-themed personal items exhibit and many more experiences.

In addition to these 3 areas, there will be plenty of other things for fans to enjoy throughout the entire day, including stage shows, event-limited original merchandise and a range of food and drink.

Also, for EXPO 2026, we will be introducing new ‘fast tickets’ to prevent late-night entry into the venue. We also welcome cosplay at the venue, so we are looking forward to seeing all your amazing outfits!

hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Supported By BANDAI

Organizer: COVER Corporation

March 6 – 8, 2026

9:00 AM – 6:00 PM (JST) (Last Entry: 5:00 PM (JST))

* Times are the same for all 3 days.

Makuhari Messe International Exhibition Halls 4-8 & Makuhari Event Hall

hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Venue Tickets

・ hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 DAY1 (March 6, 2026)

・ hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 DAY2 (March 7, 2026)

・ hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 DAY3 (March 8, 2026)

Entry Tickets: ¥6,600 (for each day)

* There are no multi-day/event tickets/passes available. * Wristbands will be handed out at the door on the day of the event.

* A maximum of 2 tickets can be purchased per person.

* Fees may be added to the ticket price at time of payment. Please check the ticket application page for more details.

* All prices are tax included.

TIME WARP Clear Bands

■ Ticket Sale Dates/Times・ 1st Round of Advance Lottery (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Application Period: December 8, 2025, 8:00 PM (JST) – December 14, 2025, 11:59 PM (JST)

Lottery Results / Payment Period: December 18, 2025, 3:00 PM (JST) – December 22, 2025, 11:00 PM (JST)

Seat Number Display: From February 1, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)

・ 2nd Round of Advance Lottery (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Application Period: December 19, 2025, 12:00 PM (JST) – December 23, 2025, 11:59 PM (JST)

Lottery Results / Payment Period: December 27, 2025, 3:00 PM (JST) – January 5, 2026, 11:00 PM (JST)

Seat Number Display: From February 1, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)

・ 3rd Round of Advance Lottery (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Application Period: December 28, 2025, 12 PM (JST) – January 7, 2026, 11:59 PM (JST)

Lottery Results / Payment Period: January 14, 2026, 3:00 PM (JST) – January 19, 2026, 11:00 PM (JST)

Seat Number Display: From February 1, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)

・ General Sales (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Sales Period / Seat Number Display: From February 1, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)* First come, first served.

Overview of “hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams Supported By LAWSON”

hololive 7th fes. marks our seventh performance in the series.

With this theme in our hearts, we continue to push boundaries with every performance.

A total of four acts will take place on the hololive stage this year. With highly anticipated newcomers and beloved veterans, expect an explosion of emotion burning brighter than ever before.

hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams Supported By LAWSON

Organizer: COVER Corporation

・ hololive STAGE1: March 6, 2026

Doors Open: 5:00 PM (JST) / Performance Starts: 6:30 PM (JST)

・ hololive STAGE2: March 7, 2026 Doors Open: 11:30 AM (JST) / Performance Starts: 1:00 PM (JST)

・ hololive STAGE3: March 7, 2026 Doors Open: 5:00 PM (JST) / Performance Starts: 6:30 PM (JST)

・ hololive STAGE4: March 8, 2026 Doors Open 11:30 AM (JST) / Performance Starts: 1:00 PM (JST)

Makuhari Messe International Exhibition Halls 1-3

hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams Venue Tickets

For hololive 7th fes., we will also have tickets available for children of elementary school age and younger so that 7th fes. can be enjoyed by the whole family. Children will be able to watch all the performances from the special ‘Family Combi Tickets’ that take into consideration the height of the children.

・ hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams hololive STAGE1 (March 6, 2026)

・ hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams hololive STAGE2 (March 7, 2026)

・ hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams hololive STAGE3 (March 7, 2026)

・ hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams hololive STAGE4 (March 8, 2026)

General Reserved Tickets: ¥11,000 (for each STAGE)

Family Combi Tickets: ¥22,000 (for each STAGE)

* There are no multi-day/event tickets/passes available. * Wristbands will be handed out at the door on the day of the event.

* A maximum of 2 tickets can be purchased per person.

* Fees may be added to the ticket price at time of payment. Please check the ticket application page for more details.

* All prices are tax included.

* 1 Family Combi Tickets are for 1 parent/guardian and 1 child. Please see the event website and ticket application page for more details.

■ Ticket Sale Dates/Times・ 1st Round of Advance Lottery (for hololive FANCLUB members) Application Period: December 8, 2025, 8:00 PM (JST) – December 14, 2025, 11:59 PM (JST)

Lottery Results / Payment Period: December 18, 2025, 3:00 PM (JST) – December 22, 2025, 11:00 PM (JST)

Seat Number Display: From March 5, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)

To Apply (for hololive FANCLUB members):

https://hololive-fc.hololivepro.com/posts/eventlive* You must be a hololive FANCLUB member to apply.

・ 2nd Round of Advance Lottery (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Application Period: December 19, 2025, 12:00 PM (JST) – December 23, 2025, 11:59 PM (JST)

Lottery Results / Payment Period: December 27, 2025, 3:00 PM (JST) – January 5, 2026, 11:00 PM (JST)

Seat Number Display: From March 5, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)

・ 3rd Round of Advance Lottery (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Application Period: December 28, 2025, 12:00 PM (JST) – January 7, 2026, 11:59 PM (JST)

Lottery Results / Payment Period: January 14, 2026, 3:00 PM (JST) – January 19, 2026, 11:00 PM (JST)

Seat Number Display: From March 5, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)

・ General Sales (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Sales Period: From February 1, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)

Seat Number Display: From March 5, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)

* First come, first served.

hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams Livestream Tickets

・ hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams hololive STAGE1 (March 6, 2026)

・ hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams hololive STAGE2 (March 7, 2026)

・ hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams hololive STAGE3 (March 7, 2026)

・ hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams hololive STAGE4 (March 8, 2026)

・ hololive 7th fes. Ridin’ on Dreams 3 Day Stream Pass

December 8, 2025, 8:00 PM (JST) – April 8, 2026, 8:00 PM (JST)* Once the performance has ended and the archive is ready, you will be able to rewatch the archived stream as much as you want until April 8, 2026, 11:59 PM (JST). * After April 8, 2026, 11:59 PM (JST), archives will no longer be able to be viewed, including those that one has not yet finished watching.

* Fees may be added to the ticket price at time of payment. Please check the ticket application page for more details.

items.title: hololive English x DOKO KOKO CAFÉ Collaboration Cafe in Malaysia from December 18
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
December 8, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce a collaboration between DOKO KOKO CAFÉ in Malaysia and the five members of hololive English -Advent-. During this period, Shiori Novella, Koseki Bijou, Nerissa Ravencroft, and FUWAMOCO will appear in an exclusive “Cyberpunk Maid” theme, which will also inspire the cafe’s interior design, menu, and limited-edition merchandise. This collaboration cafe kicks off on December 18, 2025.

Inside the café, fans will find a fully themed setup featuring life-size displays of all five members, neon cyberpunk elements, chibi character decorations, and signature motifs that bring the Cyberpunk Maid concept to life.

The collaboration menu will include 5 main dishes, 6 desserts, and 5 drinks, each crafted with details inspired by the hololive English -Advent members. During the event, each dish and beverage will be accompanied by a random coaster, and each dessert will be accompanied by a random fragrance tag. In addition, a special Christmas-themed food and beverage set will be available exclusively during Christmas week.

For any additional information and important updates please check DOKO KOKO CAFÉ’s Official Facebook Page and Reservation Site.

Collaboration Cafe Start Date: December 18, 2025 DOKO KOKO CAFÉ, G20A & B, Lalaport BBCC, 2, Jln Hang Tuah, Bukit Bintang, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia11:00 AM – 8:30 PM* Eating time is limited to 80 minutes * The restaurant zone closes at 8:30 PM

■ Acrylic Stand: RM 99

Chibi Acrylic Stand: RM 59

Acrylic Keychain: RM 48

Random Blind Badge (12 Variation): RM 28

Random Clear Card (11 Variation): RM 20 File Folder (3 Variation): RM 20

Collaboration Café Menu Details

Special Dessert: The Cell’s Sweet Pot* Get a random fragrance tag with any dessert purchase!

Doko Koko is a creative concept café and retail brand from Malaysia. Known for its immersive IP collaboration experiences, themed menus, and exclusive merchandise, Doko

Koko connects fans with the worlds they love through curated events, pop-ups, and

community-driven activities.

items.title: hololive production OFFICIAL POP-UP SHOP to Open in Tokyo Station’s First Avenue!
items.author: narita
items.content:
Talents from hololive Generation 0, hololive Indonesia Generation 1, and hololive English “Myth” will feature in special original illustrations holding flowers of appreciation at the Tokyo Station’s First Avenue shop. Items featuring event illustrations will be sold at the shop, and Tokyo Station’s First Avenue will be decorated for the event. We hope you enjoy this vibrant space for a limited time only!

Tokino Sora / Robocosan / AZKi / Sakura Miko / Hoshimachi Suisei / Ayunda Risu / Moona Hoshinova / Airani Iofifteen / Mori Calliope / Takanashi Kiara / Ninomae Ina’nis

Certain dates will require a reservation to enter the shop. Please check all reservation terms and conditions via the website below before making a reservation.

All new products with original illustrations featuring special outfits will be available to purchase.* We may limit the amount each customer can purchase of certain products depending on sales. * We are preparing sufficient stock, but we appreciate your understanding that there is a possibility that items may sell out.

* We will not be able to answer any questions about product availability (stock numbers, restocking details, etc.). Thank you for your understanding.

* Some products at this shop may be sold elsewhere after this event.

* Photos are for illustrative purposes only. Actual products may differ.

We will be handing out special novelties to those who make purchases at this shop.* All novelties are available while stocks last.

Special Decorations / Events

■ Taking Over Tokyo Station’s First Avenue! First Avenue in Tokyo Station will be transformed with special hololive decorations featuring the talents participating in this event.* Image is for illustrative purposes only.

■ Life-Sized Panel Installations Special life-sized panels featuring original illustrations will be on display.

■ Fan Participation Event – “Let’s Send a Message!” A message board where shoppers can write and stick messages for talents will be displayed. Message cards will be handed out to all customers who make a purchase.

items.title: Pardo’s Shop x Cecilia Immergreen Metal Poster Available for Pre-Order from December 6!
items.author: os_pr
items.content: December 6, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN

items.title: UNDONE x hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony Collection Available for Pre-Order from December 3rd!
items.author: narita
items.content:
December 4, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced another collaboration with UNDONE and hololive production to launch a new collection to celebrate the unforgettable hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony in 2025, featuring nine hololive production talents: Hoshimachi Suisei, Shirakami Fubuki, Sakura Miko, Houshou Marine, Tokoyami Towa, Ouro Kronii, Hakos Baelz, Kobo Kanaeru and Koseki Bijou.

This year’s collaboration transforms the music, lights, and emotions of the festival’s three stages into an exclusive lineup of collectible art pieces.

The lineup features four distinct heirlooms to be treasured forever: the Watch & Projector Box Set, the Slide Film Lightbox & Keychain, the Lightbox Bluetooth Speaker, and the Collector’s Pin Collection.

The hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony Collection

■ Hero Item: Watch & Projector Box Set Elevate your collection with the Watch & Projector Box Set, a limited-edition centerpiece. This ultimate artifact is designed to bring the concert directly to you.

■ The 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony Watch Series Each watch reflects one of the nine hololive production talents. From the dial’s iconic hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony outfit and signature icon to the penlight-inspired elements that glow with concert energy, every detail embodies the spirit of the event.

The case back showcases a lenticular design with 2–3 stacked images, producing a captivating illusion of motion that brings the talent’s performance to life.

■ Exclusive Mini Projector (Not for Sale) This exclusive centerpiece comes with a custom hololive 6th fes. Color Rige Harmony film reel, meticulously crafted to feature all nine talents.

Simply insert the film to project a rotating gallery of iconic stage visuals onto any wall, transforming any space into a personal concert hall.

■ A Unique Talent’s Card and A Special Warranty Card This exclusive unique talent’s card features the same talent as your selected watch, creating a perfectly matched set to celebrate your favorite talent.

Exclusive Merchandise Line-up

■ Lightbox Bluetooth Speaker Immerse yourself in the music and visuals of hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony. This premium Bluetooth speaker features 12 interchangeable panels, one for each of the 9 featured talents plus 3 special group shots, letting you display your favorite talent while filling your space with crystal-clear sound.

■ Slide Film Lightbox & Keychain Preserve the concert’s most iconic moments. This set includes a classic lightbox for radiant home display and a portable keychain. It comes with two exclusive slides: a stunning solo shot and a cherished group photo. Display the solo shot in the lightbox at home, or carry the group photo in the keychain.

■ Collector’s Pin Collection A meticulously crafted set featuring all nine talents, perfect for showcasing your support.

December 3, 2025, 10:00 AM EST – February 28, 2026, 11:59 PM EST Set a reminder and be ready to preorder the moment the collection drops!

UNDONE, established in 2014, is the pioneer of customized watches. Known for blending traditional craftsmanship with modern personalization, UNDONE empowers wearers to tell their unique stories.

items.title: ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- comes to AGF 2025 in South Korea, December 5-7
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
November 27, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a collaboration between ANIPLUS and hololive English -Advent- for AGF 2025 in South Korea, taking place on December 5 to 7, 2025. This collaboration includes a themed cafe as well as exclusive merchandise showcasing a new winter-themed key visual of the five members of hololive English -Advent-. This new merchandise will be available exclusively at the ANIPLUS MD booth, and includes products such as acrylic standees, can badges, and happi.

Attendees of the event can also enjoy a collaboration menu inspired by hololive English -Advent-, which can be found at the ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- café booth at AGF Korea.

For more information, please check out the ANIPLUS and AGF Korea official social media accounts below.

ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- Collaboration at AGF Korea

Event Name: AGF 2025 Venue: Ilsan KINTEX, South Korea

■ Collaboration Café Menu Caffeine Supply for our Listeners! hololive English -Advent-’s Americano Drink purchase comes with a photocard (1 of 10 designs)

A Korean Dish recommended by hololive English -Advent-! Tender Beef Kimchi Fried Rice (Contains Fried Rice, Beef Brisket, Fried Egg, Seaweed)

Food purchase comes with a mini-poster (1 of 2 designs)

All purchases of ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- merchandise will come with a double-sided A4 Hologram Poster!

items.title: Takanashi Kiara and Ninomae Ina’nis to Star in Their Shared Concert, “Takanashi Kiara / Ninomae Ina’nis 1st Concert ‘Drawn to Dawn’” at The Wiltern in Los Angeles, March 27th and 28th, 2026!
items.author: narita
items.content:
November 24, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is excited to announce the first-ever joint concert headlined by hololive English -Myth- talents Takanashi Kiara and Ninomae Ina’nis. Taking place on March 27th and 28th, 2026 at The Wiltern in Los Angeles, “Takanashi Kiara / Ninomae Ina’nis 1st Concert ‘Drawn to Dawn’” will feature various performances from both of the starring talents.

Streaming tickets are now on sale from November 24, 2025 onwards on platforms SPWN and Streaming+. Venue tickets for the event will go on sale December 4th at 4:00PM PST.

Takanashi Kiara/Ninomae Ina’nis 1st Concert “Drawn to Dawn” Overview

Takanashi Kiara/Ninomae Ina’nis 1st Concert “Drawn to Dawn” Organized by: COVER Corporation

Takanashi Kiara / Ninomae Ina’nis

Day 1: Friday, March 27, 2026

Doors Open: 6:30PM / Streaming starts: 7:30PM / Starts: 8:00PM (PDT)

Day 2: Saturday, March 28, 2026

Doors Open: 6:30PM / Streaming starts: 7:30PM / Starts: 8:00PM (PDT)

・ Early Entry GA Ticket: $130 ・ GA Ticket: $105

・ FRONT Loge / FRONT Mezzanine: $160

・ REAR Loge / MIDDLE Mezzanine: $130 ・ REAR Mezzanine: $95* Venue tickets will be available from December 4, 2025 at 4:00PM (PST)

・ 1-DAY Streaming Ticket: March 27, 2026 (PDT) ・ 1-DAY Streaming Ticket: March 28, 2026 (PDT)

・ 2-DAY Stream Pass: March 27 & 28, 2026 (PDT)

■ Streaming Ticket Purchase Links ・ SPWN: https://spwn.jp/events/evt_26032802-engkiarainanis1st ・ Streaming+: https://eplus.jp/takanashikiara_1st-st* Streaming tickets will be sold until April 28, 2026 at 8:00 PM (PDT) * Once the performance has ended and the archive is ready, you will be able to watch the archived stream as much as you like until 11:59 PM April 25, 2026 (PDT)

* After 11:59 PM April 28, 2026 (PDT) the performance archive will no longer be available for viewing.

Details regarding this concert’s merchandise will be released at a later time, so please stay tuned for future updates via our official social media channels.

Upcoming Album Release Overview

Takanashi Kiara and Ninomae Ina’nis are also releasing a new album and EP respectively.

items.title: “hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future” Watch Party in Holoearth & Free Partial Release on YouTube

November 21, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN — COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan, CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) announces that beginning November 23, 2025 12:00 (JST), viewers will be able to enjoy “hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future” through two platforms: ・ A full-version viewing event and watch party via the metaverse platform , and ・ A on the official hololive Indonesia channel.

This initiative is designed to let even more fans experience the excitement of the anniversary concert firsthand.

Chromatic Future – Watch Party in Holoearth

A will be held on , where the can be viewed in its entirety. Additionally, a with and is planned during the event period.

For full details, please see the links below:

items.title: tsun scoops x hololive English Collaboration Starting on November 23!
items.author: narita
items.content:
November 21, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is excited to announce a collaboration between Californian ice cream parlor tsun scoops and hololive English. This sweet event brings ice cream together with hololive English talents IRyS and FUWAMOCO, as well as a lineup of exclusive merchandise available both online and in-store from November 23 to December 31.

During the event, tsun scoops will transform into a dreamy hololive English paradise, decorated with original key visuals of your favorite talent. Three custom flavors inspired by IRyS, Fuwawa Abyssgard, and Mococo Abyssgard will be available for attendees to try, including:

: A strawberry sorbet with vanilla ice cream・ Fuwawaffule and Blueberries: Waffle-flavored ice cream with maple syrup and blueberries・ Mococustard Strawberry Parfait: Custard-flavored ice cream with strawberries and granola

tsun scoops, 13137 Brookhurst St., Garden Grove CA 92843

・ Monday-Friday: 2PM-9PM

・ Saturday-Sunday: 1PM-9PM

November 23, 2025 to December 31, 2025

Don’t miss out on exclusive collaboration merchandise featuring IRyS and FUWAMOCO, available on-site during the event as well as online on tsun scoops’s official website. Items include hoodies, t-shirts, acrylic keychains, acrylic standees, and bowls.

tsun scoops is a California-based premium ice cream parlor that has built its reputation through several anime and game collaborations. Proud to be an Asian-owned business, tsun scoops combines anime culture and aesthetics with a range of delicious flavors, including dairy-free options.

items.title: hololive production Announces Exclusive Fan Experiences and Live Booth Streams at Anime Frontier, December 12-14!
items.author: narita
items.content:
November 19, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is excited to announce a series of exclusive activities for fans attending at the Fort Worth Convention Center in Fort Worth, Texas. The hololive production booth is the first of its kind in the Texas area, and will be the ultimate destination for fans at the event, with a scheduled lineup of live streaming appearances, engaging activities, and special campaigns that can only be experienced at the event from December 12 to 14. The booth will be located at space , with any updates to be posted on official social media channels.

hololive production booth at Anime Frontier 2025

December 12th – 14th, 2025

Fort Worth Convention Center

1201 Houston St, Fort Worth, TX 76102

At the hololive production booth, fans will be able to partake in a host of that will not be broadcasted anywhere else. Participating talents include Airani Iofifteen and Kureiji Ollie from hololive Indonesia; Ouro Kronii, FUWAMOCO, Gigi Murin, and Raora Panthera from hololive English; and Banzoin Hakka, Machina X Flayon, Jurard T Rexford and Octavio from HOLOSTARS English.

Attendees can catch their oshis live and in-person as they interact with the crowd and participate in fun activities right on the show floor. Look forward to the full streaming schedule coming soon on SNS!

■ hololive Meet Memorial Stamps & Freebies The booth will also serve as a stop for the hololive Meet campaign. Fans can collect a Free Memorial Stamp as well as a featuring the latest official illustration for hololive Meet 2025. Additionally, Special Video Messages from this year’s hololive Meet Ambassadors will be played on-site for all attendees to enjoy!

An event-exclusive hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME English Edition PR Card featuring the hololive STAGE World Tour ‘25 -Synchronize!- Key Visual will be distributed to booth visitors as a special thank you to hololive production and TCG enthusiasts alike.

■ hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME (hOCG) English Edition Experience Want to learn the ins and outs of the new hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME in English? hololive production has prepared a dedicated space for new players to try their hand at the hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME at our booth, where experienced staff will guide newcomers through the gameplay.

Participants of our teaching space will receive a “Monthly Tournament Pack vol.1” hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME PR Card Pack, as thanks for joining in.

■ holoplus Special Campaign Attendees are encouraged to elevate their Anime Frontier experience through our official fan app, . Over the weekend, fans will have access to the Anime Frontier Exclusive Corner, available only for the duration of the event. More information can be found in-app– be sure to check it out and spread your excitement!

■ Official Social Media Links Be sure to keep an eye on Anime Frontier’s official social media accounts to stay up-to-date on any changes and upcoming events with hololive production!

About Anime Frontier Presented by Crunchyroll

Created by LeftField Media (the creators of the award-winning largest anime show on the east coast: Anime NYC), Anime Frontier is set in Fort Worth, TX, a city that blends cosmopolitan energy and cowboy culture, Anime Frontier Presented By Crunchyroll brings together the best of the US and Japan for a showcase of what’s next in Japanese entertainment. Featuring some of the biggest guests in anime and manga and leading publishers internationally to Texas, Anime Frontier is three days of exciting exhibits, exclusive premieres, and show-stopping special events. Join us for a convention unlike any other in Texas! For more, visit AnimeFrontier.com.

items.title: Twitch x hololive production “holoday” New Details Revealed
items.author: narita
items.content:
November 18, 2025, Tokyo, Japan – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) is pleased to share new details about the upcoming Twitch x hololive production “holoday” event, taking place on November 20, 2025 (PST).

In addition to the main “holoday” celebration, Twitch will host a “VTuber Week” leading up to the event, featuring a multi-day showcase that celebrates the creativity and charm of VTubers around the world, including members of hololive production. This exciting collaboration between Twitch and hololive productions aims to introduce a wider global audience to the world of hololive talents through exciting streams, custom emotes, and a series of engaging campaigns.

VTuber Week (Pre-holoday)

Leading up to holoday, Twitch will release a series of unique videos and social posts designed to highlight the diverse talents of VTubers. VTuber Week will launch with a dynamic video featuring VTubers as heroic characters embarking on new and exciting adventures on the platform.

Platforms: Twitch front page, Apple App Store, and Google Play Blog Post: A dedicated Twitch blog will introduce VTuber Week and holoday to users worldwide

holoday (November 20, PST)

On holoday featured talents of hololive production will take over Twitch’s front page and top shelf with a series of live streams and special appearances. Fans can join the celebration and earn exclusive limited-time emotes, which includes the return of the popular YAGOO Global Emote.

■ YAGOO Bronze/Silver/Gold Emotes (3 types) Unlockable by watching hololive talents on Twitch (earnable for 24 hours on November 20)

・ Yagoo (Bronze YAGOO): Watch 15mins total

・ Sadgoo (Silver YAGOO): Watch 1 hour total

・ Kingoo (Gold YAGOO): Watch 3 hours total

Usable from November 20 to December 20, 2025 (PST)

■ Talent Emotes (16 types) Unlockable by watching each participating channel for 60 minutes

Earnable from November 20–30, usable until December 20, 2025 (PST)

Twitch will also feature hololive production talents across the front page and carousel banners throughout the day, showcasing a large-scale collaboration between the two communities.

Event Overview: Twitch x hololive production “holoday”

(Same lineup as announced in the October 29 release, including members of hololive Indonesia, hololive English, and HOLOSTARS English)

items.title: iPASS x hololive production “hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony iPASS Card Blind Pack III” available from November 26!
items.author: narita
items.content:
November 13, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a follow-up collaboration with iPASS Corporation (Kaohsiung City, Taiwan; CEO: Keynes Cheng), releasing the third edition of their hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony blind pack series.

Following the overwhelming success and buzz generated by the first two blind pack releases, iPASS Corporation continues the excitement with the “hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony Transparent Card Blind Pack III” which features 20 hololive production talents and a secret edition card limited to 1,500 pieces worldwide. The third wave of blind packs will be available exclusively at 7-ELEVEN stores in Taiwan from Wednesday, November 26, 2025, once again satisfying the passionate collecting desires of hololive production fans everywhere.

As an official sponsor of “hololive SUPER EXPO 2025” and “hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony”, iPASS Corporation actively brings the charm of virtual talents into everyday life by creating transportation cards that combine both practical use and collectible value.

This Transparent Card Blind Pack series is officially licensed by “hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony 2025,” and features exquisite transparent card craftsmanship and unique character-based designs. The collection allows fans to carry and treasure their favorite hololive production talents’ most dazzling stage moments wherever they go.

The third installment of the blind pack series features a total of 20 hololive production talents along with one limited secret edition, including: Tokino Sora, Robocosan, Aki Rosenthal, Shirakami Fubuki, Nakiri Ayame, Yuzuki Choco, Oozora Subaru, Ookami Mio, Sakura Miko, Nekomata Okayu, Inugami Korone, Yukihana Lamy, Shishiro Botan, Airani Iofifteen, Anya Melfissa, Vestia Zeta, Ninomae Ina’nis, Gawr Gura, Ouro Kronii, and Nanashi Mumei. This lineup spans multiple generations and branches across hololive production, making it a must-have collection for fans.

The highlight of this release is the extremely rare secret edition, limited to only 1,500 pieces worldwide, destined to become a highly sought-after treasure among fans.

According to iPASS Corporation, the company continues to deepen its collaboration with hololive production by not only expanding the diversity and reach of transportation card applications and partnerships, but also actively bridging different audiences and market segments, bringing fans even more excitement and surprises through every new release.

All hololive production enthusiasts are encouraged to set their alarms and head to their nearest 7-ELEVEN in Taiwan on , to try their luck and bring home their favorite idol card!

The iPASS card is a convenient electronic wallet in Taiwan for cashless payments. You can use this small and easy card for many transactions such as for public transport, convenience stores, shops, malls. You can buy various goods and services with the iPASS card.
